text: (former name; Takashi Tokuhiro, 徳弘 隆) is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Mizuno was born on April 28, 1931. After graduating from Kwansei Gakuin University, he joined Yuasa Batteries in 1954. He also played for Kwangaku Club (All Kwangaku) which was consisted of his alma mater Kwansei Gakuin University players and graduates. He won 1953, 1955 and 1958 Emperor's Cup. On October 9, 1955, Mizuno debuted for Japan national team against Burma. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1955||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Takashi Mizuno
